content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5)
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5)
- Connected with pipes and small electric poles
- Currently operational, generating electricity with water flow of approximately 8 units per minute
- Boiler has been refueled with coal and is now working properly

### Iron Mining and Processing Complex at position (17.5, 72.5)
Consists of:
- 5 Electric mining drills positioned at:
  - (x=17.5, y=72.5)
  - (x=22.5, y=72.5)
  - (x=27.5, y=72.5)
  - (x=32.5, y=72.5)
  - (x=37.5, y=72.5)
- Transport belt at the first mining drill output:
  - (x=17.5, y=74.5) oriented downward
- 5 Iron smelting furnaces positioned at:
  - (x=20.0, y=76.0) - contains 5 iron plates
  - (x=24.0, y=76.0) - contains 5 iron plates
  - (x=29.0, y=76.0) - contains 5 iron plates
  - (x=34.0, y=76.0) - contains 5 iron plates
  - (x=39.0, y=76.0) - contains 5 iron plates
- 5 Steel smelting furnaces positioned at:
  - (x=21.0, y=81.0)
  - (x=25.0, y=81.0)
  - (x=30.0, y=81.0)
  - (x=35.0, y=81.0)
  - (x=40.0, y=81.0)
- 10 Inserters for material movement:
  - 5 inserters between transport belts and iron furnaces:
    - (x=18.5, y=76.5) - pickup at (x=17.5, y=76.5), drop at (x=19.5, y=76.5)
    - (x=22.5, y=76.5) - pickup at (x=21.5, y=76.5), drop at (x=23.5, y=76.5)
    - (x=27.5, y=76.5) - pickup at (x=26.5, y=76.5), drop at (x=28.5, y=76.5)
    - (x=32.5, y=76.5) - pickup at (x=31.5, y=76.5), drop at (x=33.5, y=76.5)
    - (x=37.5, y=76.5) - pickup at (x=36.5, y=76.5), drop at (x=38.5, y=76.5)
  - 5 inserters between iron furnaces and steel furnaces:
    - (x=21.5, y=79.5) - pickup at (x=21.5, y=78.5), drop at (x=21.5, y=80.5) - direction DOWN
    - (x=25.5, y=79.5) - pickup at (x=25.5, y=78.5), drop at (x=25.5, y=80.5) - direction DOWN
    - (x=30.5, y=79.5) - pickup at (x=30.5, y=78.5), drop at (x=30.5, y=80.5) - direction DOWN
    - (x=35.5, y=79.5) - pickup at (x=35.5, y=78.5), drop at (x=35.5, y=80.5) - direction DOWN
    - (x=40.5, y=79.5) - pickup at (x=40.5, y=78.5), drop at (x=40.5,
